overview: Richard Hobert, the director behind the Seven Deadly Sins series, was long silent about the sins described in these films. One summer evening in Österlen in 2000, he revealed the answers. Richard Hobert himself and the protagonist Göran Stangertz also reveal new breathtaking depths in the films when they openly and bravely tell why it was a vital necessity for them to carry out the project.
title: A Filmmaker And His Secrets
